item.title: redesigned a bunch of pages
item.description:
i've been refreshing(?) revamping(?) redesigning a bunch of my main pages which are:

  • journal
  • journal
  • about the webmaster
  • sitemap

i've just been getting bored with the way they looked. not anymore!

item.title: button corkboard is live + sotw
item.description:
added some cool new sites to my fresh-lookin' button wall which is less of a wall and more of a corkboard now. it's cute.

the new song of the week is planet of the bass by kyle gordon (feat. dj crazy times & ms. biljana electronica). it's been stuck in my head for the past couple of days. your turn!

too bad you won't see these changes live til tomorrow because it's wednesday and the party is closed. good night!

item.title: revamped hxh shrine + website birthday post!
item.description:
i've been coping with Stress by revamping my hxh shrine so it looks cooler. to me. not many content changes, it just looks different now.

i also realized that i missed sabrin.party's birthday! again! quick blog post here

item.title: song of the week*
item.description: DEVIOUS (خراب) by SADWRIST. stumbled upon this album on bandcamp. enjoying this sound a lot.

item.title: happy new year! my 2025 media wrapped
item.description: take a look at my media wrapped slideshow thang. happy new year 2006! sabrin.party/journal
